#summary Already implemented RFCs and in the way
#labels Phase-Implementation
*libSigComp* already implement:

[http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3320.txt RFC 3320]: Signaling Compression (SigComp)<br>
[http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3485.txt RFC 3485]: The Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) and Session Description Protocol (SDP) Static Dictionary for Signaling Compression (SigComp)<br>
[http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4464.txt RFC 4464]: Signaling Compression (SigComp) Users' Guide<br>
[http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4465.txt RFC 4465]: Signaling Compression (SigComp) Torture Tests<br>
[http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4070.txt RFC 4077]: A Negative Acknowledgement Mechanism for Signaling Compression<br>
[http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc5049.txt RFC 5049]: Applying Signaling Compression (SigComp) to the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP)<br>
[http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc5112.txt RFC 5112]: The Presence-Specific Static Dictionary for Signaling Compression (Sigcomp)<br>
[http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc1662.txt RFC 1662]: PPP in HDLC-like Framing<br>
[http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc1951.txt RFC 1951]: DEFLATE Compressed Data Format Specification version<br>
[http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3174.txt RFC 3174]: US Secure Hash Algorithm 1 (SHA1)<br>
3GPP TR23.979 Annex C: Required SigComp performance<br>
<br>
<br>
Will be implemented in the next releases:<br>
[http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3321.txt RFC 3321]: Signaling Compression (SigComp) - Extended Operations<br>
